about_the_game:
You are in your third year of medical school. Innocently, you think home tutoring is a good idea, and it is. But there is nothing innocent about it.

You want to be an ethical and responsible guy, but you are dominated by the throbbing you feel in your dick.

The college girls interested in your classes, don't make it easy for you to be a good guy, you end up groping them and fucking them.

Does that mean you're not professional? Not at all! You offer a comfortable service, but they want more from you.

Apparently, they are good girls; dedicated, hardworking, kind and with great virtues that you are about to discover. They need you, and you love it that way.

Now, when you have the chance to get into bed with them, you have to choose how to fuck them.

Knowing them can inspire you to know what you want from them.

♥ Akemi is 19 years old, sweet, petite and somewhat shy. However, she has no limits in fulfilling her desires (and yours).

Her actions are disguised as clumsiness, though when she goes down on your cock, you're going to thank her for it.

♥ Keiko is an exemplary girl; hardworking, independent, sporty and with a tantalizing quirk, she's a sleepwalker.

She has a busy schedule (almost as busy as her butt), so she asks you, please, to give her that class she needs at late hours.Of course, you agree.

Between her sleepwalking and the curves of her figure, you're going to have a hard time behaving yourself.

♥ Hana has started college this year, she's a spoiled, mischievous and somewhat absent-minded girl.

You become her whim, you have something she wants, she knows she can get it and with her prominent gifts on display, it's going to be inevitable to fall into temptation.

Wanting to help these girls, you're in for a dream experience.

  • Visual novel format: each girl has her own story.

  • Choose the stance: each story has variants.

  • Flashback: go back in the story at any time if you want to change a decision or relive a moment.

  • Immersive audio: including music, sound, voices and “other effects”. Modify the volume independently as you like or mute it all.

PLEASE NOTE.

  • All characters depicted and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no real or identifiable minors have been used in the production of this game.

  • Give us a hand! If you think you can improve the narrative in your language, feel free to send us your suggestions to our mail or by message on our Steam page.

  • We are still working: all the improvements and new features we develop will be added to the game at no additional cost.

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity and sexual acts graphic content.
-Not suitable for watching at work.
